originalText.text: If I could give 0 stars I would. Had a horrible experience with the staff accusing my 9 year old of being racist because he had the word “corn” written on his arm from a school event earlier in the day. It’s was scarring and extremely harmful  they way they made him feel awful before even addressing their concern with me. Not to mention he hadn’t advanced much after 7 months in tutoring.

originalText.text: My daughter truly looks forward to her Mathnasium classes. After every class, she can't wait to tell me what she has done. She loves the work, the instructors, and the atmosphere. And best of all, she is learning what she needs to learn and enjoying the learning process. It is very easy to schedule the twice weekly classes, and the staff is all superfriendly and helpful. They give you periodic feedback on your child's progress, and are open and available for questions or follow-up. I highly recommend Mathnasium.

They give you periodic feedback on your child's progress, and are open and available for questions or follow-up. I highly recommend Mathnasium.

originalText.text: Our daughter has been enrolled at  Mathnasium for the past month and she really seems to be enjoying her time there. We have been very happy with their approach to addressing her deficiencies and keeping us apprised of her progress. I would highly recommend this program to anyone whose child is struggling with math.

originalText.text: My niece Mariah deeply appreciates the non-judgmental, focused and hands-on approach to mathematics at Mathnasium. She feels comfortable with the tutors, location and that it is not overwhelming in terms of the number of weekly sessions. She is thrilled with how you are addressing her instructional gaps and yet helping her stay current with her mathematics class at school. Thank you immensely for your amazing kindness, enthusiasm and professionalism.
